tool.name: Scater read 10x data
tool.description: Loads 10x data into a serialized scater R object

param.name: matrix
param.help: File containing the matrix.mtx, genes.txt, barcodes.txt files provided by 10X. A vector or named vector can be given in order to load several data directories. If a named vector is given, the cell barcode names will be prefixed with the name.

param.name: genes
param.help: File containing the genes.txt, barcodes.txt files provided by 10X. A vector or named vector can be given in order to load several data directories. If a named vector is given, the cell barcode names will be prefixed with the name.

param.name: barcodes
param.help: File containing the barcodes.txt files provided by 10X. A vector or named vector can be given in order to load several data directories. If a named vector is given, the cell barcode names will be prefixed with the name
